name: IGN Boards - Ajax's Theme
description: This is a style tweak for the classic theme on the IGN Boards.  It fixes margins destroyed by ad placements, removes the header, footer, and most ads as well as a few aesthetic tweaks like quote colors/shadows, forum name/header backgrounds, membercard improvements, and the break in between posts.  If you have any problems or suggestions let me know.
additional_info:
v2.53 - Replaced missing background with a similar gradient.

v2.52 - Corrected membercard text color omissions 

v2.51 - Removed white space at the bottom of pages

v2.5 - Minor stylistic updates to forum lists and as well as additional consistency edits

v2.4 - Membercard adjustments

v2.31 - Readjusted Margins on recent post view

v2.30 - Adjusted recent post view on node list as well as other minor consistency edits.  Fixed issue where a username would overlap thread titles when their icon is broken.  

v2.20 - Fixed white background, fixed change to https

v2.11 - Removed footer

v2.1 - Changed post number link on each post to match the current style better.  Finally added correct style to post edits, profile pages, and the "Recent Changes".  Continued my war against Xenforo's ugly dotted borders.

v2.05 - Adjusted post and PM views to be more consistent with the theme's style 

v2.0 - A few fixes from today's turned into a redesign of the thread view.  I've always hated that ugly grey bar in between posts.  The first version I got rid of it if only to add it back because at the time I didn't have a better alternative.

v1.95 - Consistency edits and small fixes

v1.86 - New ad fixes

v 1.85 - Fixed inconsistencies with alerts and conversations tab on the bottom of the screen.  Updated preview window to match theme, adjusted colors on sub-menus and forms for more consistency.  Removed some previous items which are now included in the boards by default.

v 1.3 - Adjusted unread alert background color for better visibility.

v 1.2 - 3D effects and animations for buttons like new thread, post reply, preview, etc.  Other small fixes.

v 1.1 - Adjustments to post separators, alert/pm notifications.  Fixed an error in membercard code.  Adjustments for mobile view to keep inbox visible at the top of the page.  Other misc fixes and tweaks.

v 1.0 - Additional fixes to icon size in popups.  Icon now fills the membercard and My Account popup irrespective of its size(most notably for icons much larger than the window.  Profile pages and search results now match theme.  Misc aesthetic changes to fix small errors.

v .9 - Fixes membercard icon issues, added shadow effects to alert and conversation list items, small tweaks for mobile use which allows alerts to be visible at the top of the screen as well as the bottom

v .85 - Initial release
